mapper.select: select reserve_idx,mem_id,reserve_num,room_num,reserve_date,reserve_state,checkindate,checkoutdate,adult_cnt,child_cnt,infant_cnt,extrabed_cnt,breakfast_cnt,add_requests from reserve r where mem_id = #{param1} order by reserve_idx
select * from reserve r where mem_id = #{param1} and reserve_num = #{param2} order by reserve_date,reserve_idx desc limit 1

select pay_idx,r.reserve_idx,pay_num,AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(credit_num), SHA2('a-key',512))AS credit_num,pay_date,pay_state,credit_validity,credit_type,pay_price,pay_mileage,amount from pay p inner join reserve r on r.reserve_idx = p.reserve_idx where reserve_num = #{param1} order by pay_date desc limit 1
select distinct reserve_num from reserve r where mem_id = #{param1}
